// Code generated by sham. DO NOT EDIT.
// https://github.com/jmalloc/sham

package outputs

import (
	inputs "github.com/jmalloc/sham/generator/testdata/inputs"
	errgroup "golang.org/x/sync/errgroup"
	singleflight "golang.org/x/sync/singleflight"
	"io"
)

// Imports is a test implementation of the inputs.Imports interface.
type Imports struct {
	// Imports is the default implementation of the interface.
	// If it is nil, each method will return an error (or panic).
	inputs.Imports

	// StdLibFunc is an implementation of the StdLib() method.
	// If it is non-nil, it takes precedence over the embedded Imports interface.
	StdLibFunc func(io.Reader) io.Writer

	// ThirdPartyFunc is an implementation of the ThirdParty() method.
	// If it is non-nil, it takes precedence over the embedded Imports interface.
	ThirdPartyFunc func(errgroup.Group)

	// AliasedFunc is an implementation of the Aliased() method.
	// If it is non-nil, it takes precedence over the embedded Imports interface.
	AliasedFunc func(singleflight.Group)
}

func (stub *Imports) StdLib(r io.Reader) (w io.Writer) {
	if stub.StdLibFunc != nil {
		return stub.StdLibFunc(r)
	}

	if stub.Imports != nil {
		return stub.Imports.StdLib(r)
	}

	panic("StdLib() has no implementation, set the Imports or StdLibFunc field")
}

func (stub *Imports) ThirdParty(g errgroup.Group) {
	if stub.ThirdPartyFunc != nil {
		stub.ThirdPartyFunc(g)
	}

	if stub.Imports != nil {
		stub.Imports.ThirdParty(g)
	}
}

func (stub *Imports) Aliased(g singleflight.Group) {
	if stub.AliasedFunc != nil {
		stub.AliasedFunc(g)
	}

	if stub.Imports != nil {
		stub.Imports.Aliased(g)
	}
}
